Name: Description
Homeless Shelter Population by Race/Ethn: <g class="gr_ gr_3 gr-alert gr_gramm gr_inline_cards gr_run_anim Grammar only-ins doubleReplace replaceWithoutSep" id="3" data-gr-id="3">Number</g> of unduplicated individuals served in the New York City Department of Homeless Services shelter system.

Name: Source Notes
Homeless Shelter Population by Race/Ethn: New York City Department of Homeless Services, DHS Data Dashboard (FY 2011 - FY 2014); retrieved from https://www1.nyc.gov/site/dhs/about/stats-and-reports-tables.page

Name: Notes
Homeless Shelter Population by Race/Ethn: Race/ethnicity is reported for the head of the household for families with children and for adult families.
